name: Gone Fishin' with Archimedes
description:
The great mathematician Archimedes needs your help!

Gone Fishin' with Archimedes is a Playdate game about fishing, levers, and a poorly drawn version of the famous Greek mathematician and engineer Archimedes.

Use Archimedes' patented Seasaw™ technology to catch as many fish as possible. Balance the Seasaw™  and drop fish into the bucket to earn points.

There are also five unlockable hats for Archimedes. Does any other playdate game on the market have five unlockable hats for Archimedes? Exactly. True innovation at its finest.
